name: Dolichos pruriens
Relationship: Compare: RHUS; BELL.; HEP.; NIT-AC.; FAGOPYR.

Abdomen: Constipation, with intense itching; bloated abdomen
Skin: Yellow in spots; itching excessively at night
Intense itching, with no swelling or rash; worse across shoulders, also about elbows and knees and hairy parts
Throat: Pain in throat, worse swallowing, below right angle of jaw, as if splinter were imbedded vertically

details: A right-sided medicine, with pronounced liver and skin symptoms. A general INTENSE ITCHING without eruption. Exalted nervous sensibility. Senile pruritus. Hemorrhoidal diathesis.
dosage: Sixth potency. Tincture, drop doses, in hemorrhoids.
